testcase.classname: Full Signup, Login, and Cleanup Flow
testcase.name: Verify that recommended items can be added to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed And User navigates to "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Home page should be visible successfully...............................passed When User scrolls down to the bottom of the page............................passed Then Recommended items section should be visible............................passed When User clicks on 'Add To Cart' for a recommended product.................passed And User clicks on 'View Cart' button from recommended product..............passed Then Recommended product should be visible in the cart page.................passed
